column5: Hey All,  Looking for a nobrainer place to go fishing with a rookie.  Would like to catch anything!!!  We went to High Park once... no luck with lures....  Any ideas?
Humber and Bloor you can catch suckers all day long. LOL  Peace Ken
Float and a fake salmon egg?  Worms?
Yep and PM'd you  Peace Ken
yes, got it!  thanks a bunch!!!  will let ya know how it goes!
gforce, if you are willing to travel a little you might have some luck at the quays downtown, Leslie Spit, or Toronto Islands.  Mike
i was thinking of going out and catchin some sheephead!  never caught one in the GTA!
wade through the credit around burnhamthorpe and you'll catch rockbass, the odd smallie, and Chubs...lots and lots of Chubs
if u want pike or bass ill second the toronto islands use x-raps and spinner baits not that i know from experience but i have seen some sweet reports from there on this board
Call some charters's for lake ontario salmon. Most of them include a ticket for the derby.
Call some charters's for lake ontario salmon. Most of them include a ticket for the derby.
